A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Messy\, with lacking structure\, characters that are neither meaningful nor interesting nor coherent. Too long. Too much stupid slapstick. \nA few awesome looking scenes but with no point. Two major character deaths that don't mean anything. And a never ending side story on a casino planet that feels  extremely out of place (concerning story relevance and visuals and atmosphere). It's like a big f**k you to everything they managed to set up in \"The Force Awakens\". \nI have exactly zero interest in watching episode 9 now.
